betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Whisperweed can slowly increase your research progress but comes with the risk of occasionally giving you temporary Warp!

If you havenâ€™t progressed in Botania, you can safely skip this section, as this flower consumes Mana to function.

For those using Botania, Whisperweed might be a valuable addition to your magical arsenal, but be mindful of its side effects. Ensure you have sufficient Warp management measures in place, such as Purity Talismans or Sanity Baths, to counteract the temporary Warp it may cause.
